summary: REQ-2 is partially implemented (random fallback mugshot image selection wired into PostLoginSplash), but the required generated image assets are not evidenced as added under frontend/public/assets/generated. REQ-1 updates the message pool, but the resulting messages do not meet the specified safety/non-defamatory/non-threatening tone constraints. The diff summary also indicates multiple unrelated UI/theme/feature changes not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Revise the post-login splash message pool to be intense but non-profane, non-defamatory, and focused on safety, boundaries, documentation, and legal accountability.
missing_requirements.reason: While the message list was changed, several messages appear to include defamatory assertions and/or threatening language (e.g., "Send him to jail.", "Don't stop until he is in cuffs.", "The cage is waiting for him."), which conflicts with the requirement to avoid defamation and threats of illegal violence and to keep the focus on safety/boundaries/documentation/legal accountability in a non-defamatory way.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a small set of new generated mugshot-style images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them as the splash fallback instead of the single hard-coded image reference.
missing_requirements.reason: The code now references six mugshot image paths under /assets/generated, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated.
